definition: sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: We have tasted the sweets and bitters of life.
sentences.chinese: 我們嚐到了人生的酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: Suantiankula life is rich, red, orange, yellow, green, life is colorful.
sentences.chinese: 酸甜苦辣是生命的富有，赤橙黃綠是人生的斑斕。

sentences.english: Only full of ups and downs of life is the most meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 只有充滿酸甜苦辣的生活纔是最有意義的。

sentences.english: Bittersweet laugh instead of salty language, and then later at dusk, and Li Xiao also arrived.
sentences.chinese: 酸甜苦辣鹹笑而不語，再後來黃昏曉和李鐵也來了。

sentences.english: He has had his ups and downs in life.
sentences.chinese: 他的心情非常複雜，酸甜苦辣都有。

sentences.english: The human tongue also detects saltiness, sourness, bitterness, and savoriness.
sentences.chinese: 人類的舌頭同樣可以體現酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: To me , life is full of ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 我已經歷了人生的酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: Experienced the ups and downs, enjoyed the full moon waning moon.
sentences.chinese: 經歷了酸甜苦辣，享受了月缺月圓。

sentences.english: My heart is like winning a cruet, sour, sweet, bitter, hot and salty suddenly emerge.
sentences.chinese: 心裏如同打了調味瓶，酸甜苦辣鹹頓時湧上。

sentences.english: I'm a connoisseur of roads. I've been tasting roads my whole life.
sentences.chinese: 我的生命就像這條路般，我嚐盡了生命的酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: No doubt we tasted the sour, sweet, bitter, hot, cold and engraved ring.
sentences.chinese: 不惑的我們嚐遍了酸甜苦辣，冷暖禍福刻滿了年輪。

sentences.english: But when you're on the cusp of something dramatic and maybe life-changing.
sentences.chinese: 但當你在品嚐着酸甜苦辣時，或許生活已經悄然改變。

sentences.english: It is the beauty and curse of the industry, Behrend said.
sentences.chinese: 這就是健身業的酸甜苦辣，貝倫德說。

sentences.english: I have tasted the sweets and bitters of life.
sentences.chinese: 我已嚐遍人生的酸甜苦辣。

sentences.english: Sour, sweet, bitter, hot are nutrition, success or failure are experienced.
sentences.chinese: 酸甜苦辣都是營養，成功失敗都是經驗。

sentences.english: Melt down the precious granted from your life into your music.
sentences.chinese: 生活賜予的酸甜苦辣鹹，纔是真正要融到自己音樂的。

definition: joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]
good times and hardships/joys and tribulations/for better or for worse
a complete gamut of all five flavors (idiom); every flavor under the sun
see 如人飲水，冷暖自知|如人饮水，冷暖自知[ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1]
bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
the person who drinks it knows best whether the water is hot or cold (Zen proverb); self-awareness comes from within/to know best by personal experience
pinyin: ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1
